title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6655.9 - CSE and EISEP maintenance of effort
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6655.9 - CSE and EISEP maintenance of effort

State Regulations
(a) The office will only approve for CSE or
EISEP reimbursement expenditures above the level or expenditures made by the
area agency and other public or private service providers participating in the
CSE plan during the county's or New York City's 1979 fiscal year or the fiscal
year immediately preceding the first year the area agency participated in
CSE. (b) The office will only
approve reimbursement for EISEP expenditures made by an area agency if the area
agency maintains CSE spending at least as high as such area agency's spending
during State fiscal year 1985-86 for: (1)
total CSE service projects expenditures; and
(2)
CSE expenditures for similar nonmedical
in-home, case management, and noninstitutional respite (provided that funds may
be shifted among in-home, case management, and noninstitutional respite
services). Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
6655.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
